Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob,
I am delighted to present an exclusive opportunity for you to acquire our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of excellence. This exceptional item carries a significant value to me, reflecting years of dedication and innovation. I am extending this unique chance to own it at a special introductory price of $1200000.

The product boasts unparalleled features and benefits that surpass those of its competitors, making it an invaluable addition to your collection or business. With its high-quality craftsmanship and cutting-edge technology, it promises to deliver superior performance and satisfaction.

Considering its rarity and the investment it represents, I believe this offer presents an attractive opportunity for you. Should you choose to accept, I assure you that you will not only acquire a premium product but also gain access to unparalleled customer service and support.

Please let me know if you require any further information or have questions about the product. I am looking forward to the possibility of working with you and bringing this remarkable item into your possession.

Best regards,
Alice 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $1,200,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $1,200,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $1,000,000
